column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Items in Shopping Cart for Samsung and Apple Products,Navigate to the home page and access the Samsung category. Add items to the cart and proceed to the Apple category. Verify the displayed Apple products.,"Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Samsung' -> Navigate to page 'category/samsung'
Step 3: Click on button
Step 4: Click on button 'Buy'
Step 5: Click on link '2' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
Step 6: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/chekhly-na-iphone'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
2,Verify Successful Order Completion on Thank You Page,Navigate to the home page and select items for purchase. Proceed to checkout, enter shipping details, and complete the order. Verify the display of the Thank You page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click objects to buy items and proceed to checkout
